trans-unit.source: Defines a reusable context for interpreting or mapping XAML types, and the types in the assemblies that underlie them.
trans-unit.target: 定义可重用的上下文，用于解释或映射 XAML 类型和支持这些程序集中的类型。

trans-unit.source: A XAML schema context provides a layer of abstraction between a schema or vocabulary for XAML, and a specific parser implementation.
trans-unit.target: XAML 架构上下文提供了一个架构或词汇对于 XAML 与特定的分析器实现之间的抽象层。

trans-unit.source: By inserting the concept of a schema context, the schema can be used with different XAML parsers, and the schema context fills in the details that are needed to interact with a specific XAML parser.
trans-unit.target: 方法是插入架构上下文的概念，可与不同的 XAML 分析器，架构和架构上下文填入与特定的 XAML 分析器进行交互所需的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, the XAML schema context provides query APIs that relate to XAML concepts or to the CLR binding to the XAML type system.
trans-unit.target: 例如，XAML 架构上下文提供了查询与 XAML 概念或 CLR 绑定到 XAML 类型系统相关的 Api。

trans-unit.source: The XAML schema context is also responsible for maintaining the assembly list of loaded assemblies, which defines where a XAML parser looks for backing types.
trans-unit.target: XAML 架构上下文也是负责维护的加载程序集，它定义其中 XAML 分析器查找后备类型的程序集列表。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref> class, based on a set of reference assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref>类，基于一组引用程序集。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of assembly information items.
trans-unit.target: 程序集的信息项的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: Each assembly information item is specified by an <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> value.
trans-unit.target: 指定每个程序集信息项<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>值。</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref> class, based on a settings object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref>基于设置对象上的类。

trans-unit.source: The settings object stores information about text converter and markup extension specifics for the schema context.
trans-unit.target: 此设置对象存储有关文本转换器和标记扩展有关的架构上下文的细节信息的信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings>。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings>

trans-unit.source: The settings object to use to construct the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 设置对象，用于构造<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref> class, based on a set of reference assemblies and a settings object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref>基于一组引用程序集和设置对象的类。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of assembly information.
trans-unit.target: 程序集信息的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: Each assembly information item is specified by an <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> value.
trans-unit.target: 指定每个程序集信息项<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>值。</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: The settings object to use to construct the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 设置对象，用于构造<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides a nonstandard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Finalize" name="Finalize" href=""></xref> implementation that does not invoke <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个非标准<xref uid="langword_csharp_Finalize" name="Finalize" href=""></xref>不会调用的实现<xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: XAML schema contexts should not be disposed by automatic garbage collection or by manual operations.
trans-unit.target: 通过自动垃圾回收或手动操作，则不应释放 XAML 架构上下文。

trans-unit.source: Although XAML schema contexts have no unmanaged resources, <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDeferLoadAttribute> properties might still be active, and disposing a XAML schema context can interfere with the related defer-load operation.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 XAML 架构上下文不具有任何非托管的资源，但<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDeferLoadAttribute>属性可能仍处于活动状态，并释放的 XAML 架构上下文可能会妨碍相关的延迟加载操作。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDeferLoadAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad> event handlers, which are hooked internally as weak references, are cleaned up by this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad>通过此实现清理作为弱引用内部挂钩的事件处理程序。</xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether a XAML schema and its context use fully qualified assembly names in the values that are returned by the lookup API.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指定 XAML 架构及其上下文是否在查找 API 返回的值中使用完全限定程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value that is established in the settings for the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.%23ctor%28System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings%29> constructor signature.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces%2A?displayProperty=fullName>建立的设置中的值<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.%23ctor%28System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings%29>构造函数签名。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.%23ctor%28System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings%29> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If other signatures were used for construction or if <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is not specifically set to `true`, the value of this property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他签名已用于构造，或如果<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces%2A?displayProperty=fullName>未特别设置`true`，此属性的值是`false`。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property influences the strings that are returned by <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetAllXamlNamespaces%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值会影响受<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetAllXamlNamespaces%2A>。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetAllXamlNamespaces%2A>返回的字符串

trans-unit.source: If FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces is `true`, the assembly portion of the string reports the equivalent of <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces `true`，字符串的程序集部分报告<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的等效项

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a XAML schema and its context use fully qualified assembly names in the values that are returned by the lookup APIs; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 XAML 架构和其上下文查找 Api; 返回的值中使用完全限定程序集名称否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Searches the assemblies that are held by this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref> and returns a set of namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 搜索此保留的程序集<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref>并返回一组命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This method only searches the reference assemblies if they are passed in through construction or property setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们将传递中构造或属性的设置，则此方法将仅搜索的引用程序集。

trans-unit.source: If no assemblies are established as reference assemblies, the logic of this method examines all loaded assemblies where this <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext> is active.
trans-unit.target: 如果为引用程序集不建立了任何程序集，此方法的逻辑检查所有已加载的程序集位置这<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>处于活动状态。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of namespace identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间标识符的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers are provided as strings.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式提供这些标识符。

trans-unit.source: Searches the assemblies that are held by this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref> and returns a set of types from the specified XAML namespace.
trans-unit.target: 搜索此保留的程序集<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref>并从指定的 XAML 命名空间中返回的一组类型。

trans-unit.source: The XAML namespace to return types for.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的类型的 XAML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of XAML types.
trans-unit.target: XAML 类型的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: Each XAML type in the set is represented by a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 由集中每个 XAML 类型<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that is reported as the preferred prefix for consumers to use when they map the specified XAML namespace.
trans-unit.target: 获取被报告为使用者，它们将映射指定的 XAML 命名空间时要使用的首选前缀的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The most immediate consumer of the information is typically a XAML writer.
trans-unit.target: 信息的最直接的使用者通常是 XAML 编写器。

trans-unit.source: Other indirect consumers include design tools.
trans-unit.target: 其他间接使用者包含设计工具。

trans-unit.source: As part of the XAML binding for the common language runtime (CLR), you can specify this information by applying <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsPrefixAttribute> at the assembly level.
trans-unit.target: 作为公共语言运行时 (CLR) 的 XAML 绑定的一部分，你可以通过应用指定此信息<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsPrefixAttribute>程序集级别。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsPrefixAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The XAML namespace to get the preferred prefix for.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的首选的前缀的 XAML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: A string that consumers should use when they map the specified XAML namespace for markup use.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它们将映射指定的 XAML 命名空间的标记时，应使用使用者使用。

trans-unit.source: xmlns is null.
trans-unit.target: xmlns为 null。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> value that represents a directive, either for the XAML language or for a particular implementation.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref>表示指令，用于 XAML 语言或特定实现的值。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you create a derived class from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> as part of a XAML type system extension scenario.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建派生的类中重写此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>作为 XAML 类型系统扩展方案的一部分。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>

trans-unit.source: The XAML namespace that contains the named directive.
trans-unit.target: 包含已命名的指令的 XAML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The name of the directive to obtain.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的指令的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"></xref> object that represents the requested directive.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDirective"> </xref>表示请求的指令的对象。

trans-unit.source: xamlNamespace or name is .
trans-unit.target: xamlNamespaceor name is .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> that is based on a CLR type identifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref>基于 CLR 类型标识符。

trans-unit.source: This overload assumes that you are using the CLR for the backing type system.
trans-unit.target: 此重载假设你正在使用 CLR 的后备类型系统。

trans-unit.source: If you are not using the CLR type system, use <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetXamlType%28System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeName%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用的 CLR 类型系统，使用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetXamlType%28System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeName%29>。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetXamlType%28System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeName%29>

trans-unit.source: The type to get a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的类型<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref>有关。

trans-unit.source: The that matches the input type.
trans-unit.target: 匹配输入 type 。

trans-unit.source: type is .
trans-unit.target: typeis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> that is based on a XAML system type name.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref>基于 XAML 系统类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The XAML type name to get a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的 XAML 类型名称<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref>有关。

trans-unit.source: The that matches the input xamlTypeName.
trans-unit.target: 匹配输入 xamlTypeName 。

trans-unit.source: A component of xamlTypeName ( or ) is .
trans-unit.target: A component of xamlTypeName (<>*> or <>*>) is .

trans-unit.source: xamlTypeName is .
trans-unit.target: xamlTypeNameis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> that is based on a XAML namespace and a string for the type name.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref>基于 XAML 命名空间和类型名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This signature can specify the type arguments for cases where the desired type is a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 此签名可以指定的类型参数的情况下所需的类型是泛型类型的情况。

trans-unit.source: The XAML namespace that contains the desired type.
trans-unit.target: 包含所需的类型的 XAML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The string name of the desired type.
trans-unit.target: 所需的类型字符串名称。

trans-unit.source: The initialization type arguments for a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型初始化类型参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> that matches the input criteria.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref>与输入的条件匹配。

trans-unit.source: Called when operations use this schema context to resolve an assembly that is required in order to resolve the XAML namespaces that it contains.
trans-unit.target: 当操作使用此架构上下文来解析需要解析的 XAML 命名空间，它所包含的程序集时调用。

trans-unit.source: The underlying assembly resolution technique, which is an internal API, has built-in tolerances for different string forms of an assembly name as based on the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> construction behavior.
trans-unit.target: 基础的程序集解析技术，这是一个内部 API，已对不同的字符串形式的程序集名称的内置容差，因为基于<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>构造行为。</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this API is to enable first-opportunity resolution against known sets of assemblies, such as against reference assemblies instead of against a global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 的目的是能够首次解析针对已知的程序集，如针对而不是针对全局程序集缓存的引用程序集。

trans-unit.source: If the list of reference assemblies is populated, the default implementation can access the known reference assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 如果填充的引用程序集的列表，则默认实现可以访问的已知的引用程序集。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly to load.
trans-unit.target: 要加载的程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注。

trans-unit.source: The resolved assembly.
trans-unit.target: 解析的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerable set of reference assemblies for the XAML schema context.
trans-unit.target: 获取 XAML 架构上下文的引用程序集的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of reference assemblies for the schema context.
trans-unit.target: 架构上下文的引用程序集的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: Each assembly information item is specified by an <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> value.
trans-unit.target: 指定每个程序集信息项<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>值。</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether a XAML schema and its context support markup extensions that have two constructors with the same arity (number of input parameters).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指定拥有带相同 arity （多个输入参数） 的两个构造函数的标记扩展支持 XAML 架构和它的上下文。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value that is established in the settings for the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.%23ctor%28System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings%29> constructor signature.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>建立的设置中的值<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.%23ctor%28System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings%29>构造函数签名。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.%23ctor%28System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings%29> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If other signatures are used for construction or if <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is not specifically set to `true`, the value of this property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他签名用于构造，或如果<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>未特别设置`true`，此属性的值是`false`。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Duplicate arity of markup extensions is not specifically addressed by the XAML specification [MS-XAML], section 6.6.7.2.
trans-unit.target: XAML 规范 [MS-XAML] 第节 6.6.7.2 未专门得到解决重复 arity 的标记扩展。

trans-unit.source: This is because formation of the XAML information item for a markup extension is identical regardless of duplicate arity that might exist in the markup extension implementation.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为形成的标记扩展的 XAML 信息项而不考虑在标记扩展实现中可能存在的重复 arity 等同。

trans-unit.source: Only the actual invocation of the markup extension and its `ProvideValue` exposes any issues associated with duplicate arity.
trans-unit.target: 仅实际调用标记扩展并将其`ProvideValue`公开与重复 arity 相关联的任何问题。

trans-unit.source: Behavior for handling duplicate arity is thus undefined and is left up to each implementing XAML schema context and its XAML writer integration.
trans-unit.target: 处理重复 arity 的行为因此是不确定，并且仍最多每个实现的 XAML 架构上下文和其 XAML 编写器集成。

trans-unit.source: The default XAML schema context as implemented for .NET Framework XAML Services operations does not support duplicate arity; various .NET Framework XAML Services APIs will throw exceptions when processing markup extension usage with underlying duplicate arity.
trans-unit.target: 默认 XAML 架构上下文的.NET Framework XAML 服务操作实现不支持重复 arity;处理具有基础重复 arity 的标记扩展用法时，各种.NET Framework XAML 服务 Api 将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information about defining markup extensions, see [Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关定义标记扩展的详细信息，请参阅[的标记扩展 XAML 概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the schema context permits markup extensions that have duplicate arity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果架构上下文允许有重复 arity; 的标记扩展否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the success or failure of a request for a compatible XAML namespace.
trans-unit.target: 返回兼容的 XAML 命名空间的请求成功与否。

trans-unit.source: A successful request reports that XAML namespace as an out parameter.
trans-unit.target: 请求成功报告作为输出参数的 XAML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method uses the following lookup order: 1.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在内部，使用以下查找顺序︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: An internally implemented compatibility dictionary, which may have been populated by an earlier lookup.
trans-unit.target: 已由早期查找填充一个内部实现的兼容性字典。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute> parameter evaluation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute>参数评估。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If no other compatible namespace is discovered and this method returns `false`, the `compatibleNamespace` parameter output might have the same value as the `xamlNamespace` input.
trans-unit.target: 如果不发现任何其他兼容的命名空间，并且此方法返回`false`、`compatibleNamespace`参数输出可能具有相同的值作为`xamlNamespace`输入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_xmlns" name="xmlns" href=""></xref> string for the XAML namespace to be checked for a compatible result.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_xmlns" name="xmlns" href=""> </xref>要检查是否存在兼容结果的 XAML 命名空间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_xmlns" name="xmlns" href=""></xref> string for a compatible XAML namespace request.
